comment: The natural logarithm of the quotient of two positive real numbers is the difference of natural logarithms. Exercise 72(a) and Property 3 of [Cohen] p. 301, restricted to natural logarithms. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 25-Nov-2007.)
